birth_place.zh-cn: 奉天省锦州府义州沈家台镇下碾盘沟村

description.zh-cn: 中国左翼作家，“东北作家群”的领军人物。
description.en: A Chinese left-wing writer and a leading figure of the 'Northeast Writers' Group'.

description.zh-cn: 萧军的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Xiao Jun.

description.zh-cn: 中国近现代女作家，曾与萧军同居并共同创作。
description.en: A modern Chinese female writer, who once lived with Xiao Jun and co-authored works.

description.zh-cn: 一个中国现代文学流派，成员多为东北籍或流亡东北的作家。
description.en: A modern Chinese literary school, whose members were mostly writers from or exiled in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 由张作霖在沈阳主办的军事学校。
description.en: A military academy founded by Zhang Zuolin in Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期重要军阀，奉系军阀首领。
description.en: An important warlord in the early Republic of China, leader of the Fengtian clique.

description.zh-cn: 日本关东军在中国东北蓄意制造并发动的一场侵华战争，是日本帝国主义侵华的开端。
description.en: An invasion of China deliberately staged by the Japanese Kwantung Army in Northeast China, marking the beginning of the Japanese imperialist invasion of China.

description.zh-cn: 九一八事变后，在中国东北地区由民众自发组织的抗日武装。
description.en: Anti-Japanese armed forces spontaneously organized by the people in Northeast China after the Mukden Incident.

description.zh-cn: 萧军与萧红合著的第一部小说、散文合集。
description.en: The first collection of short stories and essays co-authored by Xiao Jun and Xiao Hong.

description.zh-cn: 萧军的成名作长篇小说。
description.en: Xiao Jun's famous novel that brought him to prominence.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学家、思想家、革命家，对萧军等左翼作家有重要影响。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, thinker, and revolutionary who had a significant influence on left-wing writers like Xiao Jun.

description.zh-cn: 中国文艺理论家、文学翻译家、文艺活动家。
description.en: A Chinese literary theorist, translator, and cultural activist.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的重要理论家和宣传家。
description.en: An important theorist and propagandist of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: A Chinese politician and a member of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 1930年代中国左翼文学界提出的一个文学口号，主张文学创作应服务于抗日国防。
description.en: A literary slogan proposed by the Chinese left-wing literary circle in the 1930s, advocating that literary creation should serve the national defense against Japan.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由阎锡山在山西临汾创办的学校。
description.en: A school founded by Yan Xishan in Linfen, Shanxi, during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期军阀，长期统治山西。
description.en: A warlord during the Republic of China era who ruled Shanxi for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第一代主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: One of the first-generation main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、翻译家，在延安整风运动中遭到批判。
description.en: A Chinese writer and translator who was criticized during the Yan'an Rectification Movement.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国沈阳市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Shenyang, China.

description.zh-cn: 1940年代在哈尔滨的一个出版社，萧军曾任社长。
description.en: A publishing house in Harbin in the 1940s, where Xiao Jun once served as director.

description.zh-cn: 萧军曾担任主编的报纸。
description.en: A newspaper where Xiao Jun once served as editor-in-chief.

description.zh-cn: 曾与《文化报》发生论争的报纸。
description.en: A newspaper that had a dispute with 'Wenhua Bao' (Culture Newspaper).

description.zh-cn: 一起导致萧军被排斥出文艺界的论争事件。
description.en: A dispute that led to Xiao Jun's exclusion from the literary and art circles.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场大规模政治运动，对社会造成了巨大破坏。
description.en: A large-scale political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, which caused immense damage to society.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期中国东北地区的省份，为萧军的出生地。
description.en: A province in Northeast China during the Qing Dynasty, the birthplace of Xiao Jun.

description.zh-cn: 萧军与王德芬在西安相识相恋后结为夫妻。
description.en: Xiao Jun and Wang Defen met, fell in love, and got married in Xi'an.

description.zh-cn: 1933年与萧红同居，1938年在西安分手。
description.en: Lived together with Xiao Hong from 1933 and broke up in Xi'an in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 1929年考入东北陆军讲武堂第九期，后被开除。
description.en: Enrolled in the ninth class of the Northeast Military Academy in 1929, but was later expelled.

description.zh-cn: 东北陆军讲武堂由张作霖在沈阳主办。
description.en: The Northeast Military Academy was founded and hosted by Zhang Zuolin in Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 1934年11月到上海后，得到鲁迅亲自指导，可视为师徒关系。
description.en: After arriving in Shanghai in November 1934, he received personal guidance from Lu Xun, which can be considered a mentor-student relationship.

description.zh-cn: 由于和民族革命大学校长阎锡山的矛盾，萧军离职。
description.en: Xiao Jun resigned due to conflicts with Yan Xishan, the president of the National Revolution University.

description.zh-cn: 1938年前往西安途中经过延安时，受到毛泽东接见。
description.en: Was received by Mao Zedong in 1938 while passing through Yan'an on his way to Xi'an.

description.zh-cn: 1938年前往西安途中经过延安时，受到周恩来接见。
description.en: Was received by Zhou Enlai in 1938 while passing through Yan'an on his way to Xi'an.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅曾著文攻击批评《八月的乡村》一书的张春桥。
description.en: Lu Xun wrote an article attacking Zhang Chunqiao, who had criticized the book 'Village in August'.

description.zh-cn: 《文化报》与《生活报》曾发生论争。
description.en: 'Wenhua Bao' (Culture Newspaper) had a dispute with 'Shenghuo Bao' (Life Newspaper).

description.zh-cn: 因萧军赞成周扬主张的国防文学，而遭到鲁迅的批评。
description.en: Xiao Jun was criticized by Lu Xun for his support of the National Defense Literature advocated by Zhou Yang.

description.zh-cn: 九一八事变爆发后，萧军参与组织抗日义勇军。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident, Xiao Jun participated in organizing the Anti-Japanese Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 九一八事变后，萧军参与组织抗日义勇军。
description.en: After the Mukden Incident, Xiao Jun participated in organizing the Anti-Japanese Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 与萧红合著了小说、散文合集《跋涉》。
description.en: Co-authored the collection of short stories and essays 'Bumping' with Xiao Hong.

description.zh-cn: 与萧军合著了小说、散文合集《跋涉》。
description.en: Co-authored the collection of short stories and essays 'Bumping' with Xiao Jun.

description.zh-cn: 创作并自费出版了长篇小说《八月的乡村》。
description.en: Wrote and self-published the novel 'Village in August'.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅为《八月的乡村》作序并给予高度评价。
description.en: Lu Xun wrote a preface for 'Village in August' and praised it highly.

description.zh-cn: 周扬对《八月的乡村》给予了高度评价。
description.en: Zhou Yang highly praised 'Village in August'.

description.zh-cn: 胡乔木对《八月的乡村》给予了高度评价。
description.en: Hu Qiaomu highly praised 'Village in August'.

description.zh-cn: 萧军赞成周扬等左翼作家主张的国防文学。
description.en: Xiao Jun supported the National Defense Literature advocated by left-wing writers like Zhou Yang.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁迅逝世六周年纪念大会上，萧军为王实味说话。
description.en: At the meeting commemorating the sixth anniversary of Lu Xun's death, Xiao Jun spoke up for Wang Shiwei.

description.zh-cn: 张春桥曾撰文批评萧军的小说《八月的乡村》。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao wrote an article criticizing Xiao Jun's novel 'Village in August'.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅对周扬等人提出的“国防文学”口号持批评态度。
description.en: Lu Xun was critical of the 'National Defense Literature' slogan proposed by Zhou Yang and others.

description.zh-cn: 因为《文化报》与《生活报》的论争事件，萧军被排斥出文艺界。
description.en: Because of the dispute between 'Wenhua Bao' and 'Shenghuo Bao', Xiao Jun was excluded from the literary and art circles.

description.zh-cn: 萧军在文化大革命中受到了迫害。
description.en: Xiao Jun was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution.

position.en: Dean of Lu Xun Academy of Arts and Literature
